content.question: Both buildings are part of a complex built to celebrate

choices.label: the conquests of Alexander the Great
Athens’ domination of the eastern Mediterranean
the deification of the Roman emperor
the end of the Trojan War

content.answer: Athens’ domination of the eastern Mediterranean

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
